languages.text: CyberLaserax deals shock damage to all targets within 2 cells at the start of its turn.

languages.text: At the start of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this creature deals {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} to each target in a 2-cell radius.

languages.text: Diese Kreatur fügt allen Zielen in einem Radius von 2 Feldern zu Beginn ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}Schockschaden{/g} zu.

languages.text: Au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, cette créature inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}dégâts d'électrocution{/g} à chaque cible dans un rayon de 2 cases.
